# Question 1 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df = tibble(
  samp = rnorm(10),
  samp_logical = samp > 0,
  samp_character = nchar(samp),
  samp_levels = as.numeric(as.factor(samp_character))
)

```

# Section 2

I can take the mean of the sample, too!
The mean is `r mean(samp)`.
